DOC.brief_summary: Propofol can be measured continuously in breath gas during anesthesia. This study compares propofol concentration in plasma and breath gas and processed electroencephalographic monitoring (bispectral index) under clinical conditions with patients and total intravenous anesthesia. Target controlled infusion technique is used to deliver adequate propofol concentration in plasma.
DOC.brief_title: Breath Gas Measurement of Propofol During Anesthesia in Patients With Endourological Procedures
